sentences.sContent: Industry rivalry and the threat of retaliation.
sentences.sContent_eng: Industry rivalry and the threat of retaliation.
sentences.sCn: 同行业竞争和报复的威胁。

sentences.sContent: "If you know what to say and how to say it, you can speak up and keep the risk of retaliation to a minimum, " he said.
sentences.sContent_eng: "If you know what to say and how to say it, you can speak up and keep the risk of retaliation to a minimum, " he said.
sentences.sCn: 他说：”如果你知道说什么、如何说，你就能为自己讨回公道，并将被报复的风险降至最低“。

trans.tranOther: action against someone who has done something bad to you
